scripts.postinstall: (cd client && yarn install) && (cd server && yarn install)
scripts.build: (cd client && yarn build) && rm -rf server/dist && cp -R client/dist/gradtrak server/dist
scripts.build-dev: (cd client && yarn build-dev) && rm -rf server/dist && cp -R client/dist/gradtrak server/dist
scripts.watch: concurrently -n client,server --handle-input "cd client && yarn start" "cd server && yarn watch"
